website_summaries.verdict: The Belkin N750 DB Wireless Dual-Band N+ router is arguably the most affordable 450Mbps true dual-band router on the market and, while far from perfect, it's likely to deliver more than what you pay for.
pros: The affordable Belkin N750 DB Wireless Dual-Band N+ router offers fast 5GHz wireless speeds and has two USB ports for hosting an external storage device or printer
The good-looking device also features true dual-band Gigabit Ethernet and comprehensive guest networking
cons: The Belkin N750 DB's 2.4GHz wireless speed and 5GHz range could be better, and its current firmware doesn't support IPv6
The router's vertical stand design, though eye-catching, makes it topple easily

customer_reviews.title: Dropped internet hourly
customer_reviews.text: I had the Belkin N1 Vision and loved it, I upgraded to the N750 for the USB capabilities. The set up was more challening but I got it up and running. The router dropped internet connection about every hour or so forcing me to unplug and replug the router to reconnect. (Note when I plugged the modem directly to computer (Bipassing the Belkin) I had internet. I contacted the Belkin support (five times) they would get me online but again an hour or so later it would drop internet connection. I suggest against this Belkin, the N1 Vision is great, but does not have the USB ports in back for wireless printing and Ext HD hook up. R, John
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last for very long!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot in good conscience recommend this router to anyone. Amazon was great, in that they quickly replaced the first one I bought when it arrived DOA. I figured, this type of thing happens, not to worry and the replacement worked fine... for a few months. On the positive side, when it was working, it certainly had adequate range and it was very simple to set up. So 6 months later, of course it is too late for me to return the defective thing to Amazon. So I am now dealing with a warranty claim. No fun at all, but such is life. But hopefully I can save you some grief. It's simple -- don't buy the darned thing!
customer_reviews.author: The Catservant

customer_reviews.title: Belkin N750 Setup
customer_reviews.text: Great product once you get it set up. You will DEFINITELY need cust support to do it. Had it set up quick, and working with 10mhz download right away - but LOTS or errors. Would take several minute to download any web page. Took 45 min on the phone to get it set up right (default auto settings don't work). Setting up a home network is a nightmare - still can't get it to work. On the good side, the two USB ports work great. I'm sharing 2 printers, and it found them both first thing. The wireless range is great - much better than my previous D-Link.
customer_reviews.author: Gator

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: I am only now leaving this review and its too late to return this, but it NEVER WORKED! I still have it in the box under our computer. What a terrible buy on our part but we should also processed a return. We just didnt know how to at the time.
customer_reviews.author: LouLou

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and fast connection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this router to speed up my wireless network and share a printer with my family via USB on the router. The set up was easy and all kids' laptops connected with the router successfully (1 is G and 2 are N). Belkin N600 dual band adapter also works great with this router(3-4 times faster than my old wireless-n router/adapter combination). Gigabit wired connection works great,too and the printer sharing is working with not problem. It's a good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TONO

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I live on a half acre property and my house is pretty long. After buying the cheap routers realized that my internet connection was slow because I wasn't getting a proper signal. After hooking this bad boy up I can listen to Pandora outside all the way to the end of the yard and check my emails if I'm at my neighbors house while still being connected to my router. This router has range and the speed I need to run all my devices and laptops in my home with nothing far from excellent.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE

customer_reviews.title: Great workhorse
customer_reviews.text: The router is super efficient it has three types of transmissions one of 5 Hz works for video, recommending that the router is install in the room to fail the most of the videos on family and 2.4 Hz is the workhorse since we used in a building and he himself used three small family groups the router is installed on the second floor with a family and two-family on the first floor with the advantage that live below where is located the Router and third is 2.4 guest Hz which is a little slower but excellent for visits.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G.

customer_reviews.title: Setup difficulties
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an old Linksys router, and had issues with it broadcasting 2 of the same home network. Had several exchanges with tech support which was less than helpful, and didn't resolve the issue. I finally sent it back and purchased a new Linksys router, which I installed and am using, no problems. I will say it did seem to have a better broadcast signal than the Linksys, but the setup and tech support issues were disappointing. The setup and maintenance software used with Linksys is much more user-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your Lucky if you get it to work for more than a week!
customer_reviews.text: It worked great the first few days. Had to contstantly unplug and reset the device. I finally called Belkin for support because I couldn't get it to connect to my devices. They informed me I must had had a power surge and the router reset to factory default. They suggested I plug it into a power surge device.....it was! They tried to sell me an additional warranty! Needless to say I boxed the router back up and returned it. It's a shame...I had a older Belkin router for years and never had any issues, until my cat chewed on the anteneas.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is wonderful - shipped quickly AND I IMMEDIATELY HOOKED IT UP ...
customer_reviews.text: It is wonderful - shipped quickly AND I IMMEDIATELY HOOKED IT UP AND WORKS BEAUTIFULLY. I AM MOST HAPPY WITH THIS PURCHASE. The same router lasted only 2 years and the one prior lasted only 1 year. Belkin has a horrible warranty. They should at least guarantee these routers for 3 years. Also could not use my own password but rather had to stick with the one the company sent with the unit. Who knows who has access?????????? How do others feels about this?
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Lake

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: We needed to get a longer range on our home network and our Xfinity modem/router just wasn't doing it. Added this Belkin and now we all get an excellent connection on our wireless devices. I had my internet provider assist me and it was all done in less than 30 minutes without having to manually add each device back to the network. Not sure really if that was from the great support help I got this time or not, but I am just so happy with the signal output in our home. Even through 3 or 4 walls and about 75 feet the signal strength is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: jennie

customer_reviews.title: Great Router..
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I was hesitant the purchase this item.. I was primarily concerned about the reviews that said they had trouble with maintaining a connection. I went ahead and bought it, as my last router was a Belkin. I have been pleasantly surprised with how well it works. No connection problems at all. The price was great too. I would definitely recommend this product..
customer_reviews.author: James King

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Belkin N750 Wireless Router for a friend. I also waited until he used it for a while, just to make sure. Needless to say, He is one happy camper. It works perfect, and he loves it. You see, I have a Belkin too, and mine has worked perfect from day one, almost 3 years now, and it's working perfect right now. It's a wonderful product. That says it all.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: This router is really great and allows for great transfer speed. It was really easy for set up and maintenance. There are great security features including the ability to give guest access to your network so you don't have to give everyone your passcode. I love the USB ports that allow you to transfer data without using a server and across platforms. After power outages it is quick to restart. The included software not only helps fix problems but allows you to access the control panel from any network connection so you can change settings while you are away from home.
customer_reviews.author: asb

customer_reviews.title: Flaky wireless
customer_reviews.text: The performance is very good when it works... but the problem is that more often than not, it doesn't work. I see huge gaps in wireless connectivity, sitting in the same room on the 2.4ghz wireless. Routers need to provide a consistent service, this one doesn't. Cannot recommend this router to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Greenkiwi

customer_reviews.title: Had it with Belkin
customer_reviews.text: Could not make it work out of the box. Spent 6 hours over two days with Belkin tech support and all they could do is repeat the same instructions over and over again, even though they did not work the first time. Returned the first one to amazon and they replaced overnight... the second unitwas the same as the first. Tried Belkin support again and went through the same routine over several hours. When I requested to speak to a higher level technician because we were doing the exact same ineffective things repeatedly, Belkin refused to let me speak to a supervisor. Totally frustrated...complete waste of time. I will never touch another Belkin product again.
customer_reviews.author: John and Shoshana Doermer

customer_reviews.title: Great Speed--Bad Firmware
customer_reviews.text: This router is much quicker than my previous N 300MB router. I like the option to connect a hard drive. The biggest con with this device is the firmware! Belkin is holding the hardware hostage with their firmware. I truely hope DD-WRT come out with the Belkin N750 version cause Belkin taunted me with a great router then bound it's hands with mediocre software.
customer_reviews.author: JoshK

customer_reviews.title: Not what I'm used to from Belkin
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product is not worth a dime. I have had nothing but constant problems since purchasing to replace an earlier model Belkin router. It had constant issues of dropping connections and had no better connection speeds or range. I contacted Belkin customer support on two separate occasions and they had me try changing multiple settings which did not solve any issues. The final change was to reinstall the modem system entirely and it will not connect at all to the internet. I'm attempting to return at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: with some nice features. Only reason it didn't get five stars ...
customer_reviews.text: A very reliable little router, with some nice features. Only reason it didn't get five stars is because it advertises "Intellistream" (packet shaping, QOS) and it only really slows your connection, so I just disable it. Still like the router though and am using it today with no plans to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: jbn34435

customer_reviews.title: it's a great router. When it does break
customer_reviews.text: The router worked well for a while for me, but for some reason, I went on vacation and came back, and it stopped working. It wouldn't transmit a signal and I tried everything under the book. I ended up returning it. If it doesn't break on you, it's a great router. When it does break, it sucks. Be cautious.
customer_reviews.author: CTK

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother-in-law and it went out in 3 1/2 months! I tried to exchange it for a new one only to find out the warrenty was for 3 months. I emailed Amazon and they didn't bother to respond. Don't waste your money!!!!!!!! So frustrating! PIECE OF JUNK!!!
customer_reviews.author: STLGIRL

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere for a decent router
customer_reviews.text: This router was easy to setup and looked like it was just what I was looking for for a fast reliable reasonably priced router. Two weeks later I am back to using my 5 year old router. It continued to lose connection intermittently and finally just stopped working all together. I missed return date by 2 days. Will not purchase another Belkin product should have listened to the other negative reviews.
customer_reviews.author: PSutfin

customer_reviews.title: Gigabit ethernet. Longer range WiFi. Not a print server.
customer_reviews.text: As a router, it is generally easy to configure. It has two USB ports at the back. One of which I used to hook up a portable drive. It worked great as a network file server. To hook a printer, you could use the other USB port, but you would need the Belkin software to use the printer. Each computer in the network must have that software to use the printer. A big disappointment. Also, if you are thinking of using this router to AirPrint to a non-AirPrint compatible printer, then forget it. The router does not support Bonjour.
customer_reviews.author: CALOi

customer_reviews.title: Works great, very useable features.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. paired with Belkin N600DB USB adapter (which also worked well). Lots of great features including hard drive sharing for external USB hard drive, multiple net SID broadcast (separate for 5ghz, 2ghz and a "public" network). I do have to reset it once in a while but I am 100% convinced that's my cable company. Have recommended to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Rich B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this router!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this router to replace a Cisco Linksys model dual band and it performs very well. Have not had any signal drops, streaming video works great to the living room and the bandwidth to Amazon is typically at 75-85% range, which is great! I especially like the USB plugin and how easy it is to setup a media device for the network. It was plug and play and works great with my Sony Blue Ray for streaming media. Have not played with the Panasonic BR yet, but should work the same. Overall, very happy with the specs, setup and performance fo this unit!
customer_reviews.author: Russell McCarty

customer_reviews.title: must have got a defective one:(
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months ago and it has failed already . worked great first couple of months but all of a sudden it wont work. I get an error message saying invalid IP . nothing I do will get it working:( I bought a different one so I could get back online and it works fine. wasted my money on this:(
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Belkin n750
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace an older Netgear router this one was faster and had the usb input I was looking for. I hook up my external hard drive and that is where my issue was they use Twonky that only recognizes part of my back up drive. Returned it and bought a Asus RT-N66U . As far as the wireless side of this router it seemed fine but only used it overnight
customer_reviews.author: sndparker

customer_reviews.title: Belkin for the Home Network
customer_reviews.text: The Belkin N750 has been a great addition to my home network. Previously, I had an older Belkin router that supported only b & g. It would frequently lockup, especially when I was using my tablet (ASUS Transformer). Now, with a computer, the tablet, and a smartphone operating simultaneously, I've never experienced a lockup or even a slow down. I bought it because it rated very well in various tech reviews and for the available features, was competitively priced. Setup with the supplied documentation is a snap and was pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Lino

customer_reviews.title: Great router
customer_reviews.text: Loved this Belkin, but shortly after purchase I switched over to Verizon and they would not let me use it, they want me to rent theirs which made me very upset as this Belkin worked wonderful for me. Saving for when I switch to another cable provider!
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Only Belkin from now on
customer_reviews.text: Last time I needed a router I bout Net Gear. That was a bad choice. The router didn't last much longer than the warranty. I really like that with Belkin, I have my own online service account and can fix most issues myself, without losing ISP info. Thank you, Belkin for a great product and great service.
customer_reviews.author: fiddledee

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as i hope
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work as i expect. The security is poor, i use MAC Address Filtering but this router just have filter for 20 MAC Addresses and needed more, i couldn't change the username for admin. Finally i bought a new router a TPLink AC7 1750 which have all the configurations i need
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Gutierrez Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Works very well and easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and easy to set up! My Belkin never seems to drop a signal while I am using it. Over night it has disconnected but always reconnects itself without me having to reboot it like I did on my old router. I have not figured out the USB plug in for the Printer yet. I thought that should be a plug-n-play feature...
customer_reviews.author: Ironpike

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Much better than what I've had in the past, but still sometimes glitchy like a bargain product. For the price, awesome. I love that I can watch media from any other device on any other device. I've loaded a flashdrive with good movies and stuck it in the USB port, I can watch them from any other device too.
customer_reviews.author: B. A. Pendell

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: After owning a Netgear for 9 months and constantly having disconnects, firmware issues, etc... I decided I'd had enough and purchased this router - I've had this for almost a month and after initial setup (which was a breeze), I haven't touched it. Outstanding wireless range and easy-to-use interface, all at a cheap (relatively speaking) price - love it!
customer_reviews.author: Just Us

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly and did not work at all
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on a Gizmodo.com review, even though some of the comments were sketchy. It seemed to be working fine, but my Roku would not connect to it, even though my laptop was on no problem. I tried changing the password and the router powered down, and never powered back up again. This despite plugging it in and unplugging it the next day. It just never turned back on again. I sent it back to Amazon the next morning, it was very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Lars

customer_reviews.title: great product and speed is fast
customer_reviews.text: this is really great for multiple computer/laptops, cell phones using wifi and tablets. i haven't experienced any issues with connection and speed. would definitely recommend this product. the only thing i didn't like is when i changed the password to my own it would not detect the router. so i had to keep the network name and password it came with the same. i'll have to trouble shoot to fix this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Saldaña

customer_reviews.title: ... the network features have worked and are still working fine for over 3 years now
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Nov 2011 and the network features have worked and are still working fine for over 3 years now. I mainly use it with a LAN cable. The wireless speed suits my needs for the times when I go wireless. I had issues setting up the USB features. I have a USB hub and stuck with that given the trouble I had trying to get this router's USB features set up. I would have given a 5 star if the USB features would have been easier to set up and work reliably.
customer_reviews.author: JR22

customer_reviews.title: Speed is excellent, but the internet is constantly dropping
customer_reviews.text: Speed is excellent, but the internet is constantly dropping. Didn't do that with our old router. Wish we had gone with a different one. A
customer_reviews.author: Rob B.

customer_reviews.title: What a mess of disappointment. I would never buy another Belkin
customer_reviews.text: Would not work properly. Called in the Pros and they tried. Called Belkin direct...they walked us through a long repair and in conclusion said it was defective and return it. What a mess of disappointment. I would never buy another Belkin. Had Comcast come in and they set up their wireless in a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: The Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this some time back and has been in use constantly. It has the four ports that I am using wired up as the what I had before. The wi-fi part has been working with no problems or interference. I have in in the basement of my home and my cell phone and internet radio works fine. Signals are strong. //... Joe
customer_reviews.author: Joe A. R

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR THE AVERAGE HOME
customer_reviews.text: lOVE IT..... WE ALL USE STREAMING DATA DEVICES, NETFLIX AND ALL THAT GOOD STUFF AND IT HAS A GREAT RANGE, WHERE OTHERS WOULD DROP OR LOOSE SIGNAL. THIS 750 WORKED GREAT.. NO COMPLAINTS EXCEPT AS A "GEEK" NOT AS MANY FULL CONFIG OPTIONS AS I WOULD HAVE LIKED, BUT ENOUGH TO MAKE IT WORTHY OF ITS PRICE TAG. GREAT FOR ANYONE......
customer_reviews.author: Educational Roots

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up - Excellent signal strength
customer_reviews.text: I choose this router because of the capabilities it offered. It isn't the one with all the bells and whistles, but it has enough to power to provide me with wifi even when I'm on the ground floor of my condo. There will always be someone who has a bad experience and wants everyone to know about it. Don't listen or read their reviews. This is a high quality product that does what it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: khr110

customer_reviews.title: Charge you to make it work.
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't stay on line. After messing with it for an hour, I called in for help. They wanted to charge me to set the router so it would stop dropping the signal. REALLY, I just bought this router. It should be free.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Leet

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly. We had another model of Belkin, and we "outgrew" it - more computers, the tv has to have an internet connection, etc. Since we were happy with the older model, we bought the larger one, and it works like a charm. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: ... we only had it for 2 months and still like new, gona wait if it lasts longer than ...
customer_reviews.text: I give it a 3 for now cause we only had it for 2 months and still like new, gona wait if it lasts longer than the last one we bought which only lasted for 5 months but for now its not bad not as powerful as they say though but at least it works
customer_reviews.author: Danny Martin

customer_reviews.title: N750 Wi-Fi Router
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to setup and configure with an existing network. I especially like have 4 wired ports plus Wi-Fi. Easy to setup advanced features like Port/Forwarding. The router has very good coverage range - laptop in bedroom ~30ft, laptop in living room ~70ft; signal strength 5 & 4 bars respectively. Downside, the N750 consistently checks for wireless devices on the net and if not found, it pops-up an annoying window? For the price, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford A Brock

customer_reviews.title: MORE THAN MY EXPECTATIONS!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Router because I received a Roku as a gift. I had an older router and could not set up the Roku at all! I had a little trouble connecting the Belkin, but tech support got me up and running in no time. I am now streaming TV through my home network smoothly and without any interruption.
customer_reviews.author: kcharles

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work!
customer_reviews.text: Though this was the recommended product by our ISP, we opened the package and tried to hook it up, only for it to fail. Had the internet person out to try it as well, and he concluded that the router was broken. Will be returning it. Hopefully, this was just a fluke.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Oakland

customer_reviews.title: Works better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product since April and despite what some of the reviews said. I plugged it in and connected my devices to it and have had no issues at all. I use a Roku and get great speeds for my HD movies and its great for working from home.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Derosier

customer_reviews.title: The guest wireless is real finicky and doesn't like to work from time to time
customer_reviews.text: Does wonders but tends to lag from time to time. That may just be my personal internet though. The guest wireless is real finicky and doesn't like to work from time to time, but if you use it for just one wifi signal it works great
customer_reviews.author: NEOMeifwa

customer_reviews.title: Great Router! But...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great router which works right out of the box. Setup was a breeze, and so far have had no issues. Signal strength is strong and range is much better than the linksys I was replacing. The 2 USB ports are a nice feature which lets me share my printer and a usb drive instantly. However, the one thing I didn't know, was that this router does not support USB drives formatted for Mac (i.e. HFS). Only NTFS or FAT32 formats are currently supported. This was a major disappointment as I am primarily a Mac user. I am really hoping that Belkin will provide a firmware fix for this asap!!
customer_reviews.author: Nidster

customer_reviews.title: Better than people would have you believe.
customer_reviews.text: Even tho we just have a home network, it is important for me to see and access all the PC's in my network. This was the ONLY router I tried that DID that, out of the box. I returned MANY routers because, no matter what I tried, I could not view my home network. This is the 2nd one I bought. DO NOT UPGRADE THE FIRMWARE ! That is the reason I had to get another. However, I have used Belkin routers for nearly 15 years now. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J Krushenski

customer_reviews.title: great router
customer_reviews.text: Bought this router because I needed a stronger signal for my new smart tv/other smart devices. Works great! Easy set up, sleek look, powerful signal. I have not had to restart the router at anytime. The signal is strong enough to allow 1 smart phone, 2 computers, 1 xbox live and 1 smart tv to all be used at one time and not slow at all. This product is very worth getting!
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Wi-Fi Extraordinaire
customer_reviews.text: So I waited for this one and when it became available, I jumped on it. It is super fast, easy to set up and unobtrusive. I am still working on getting the maximum out of it but have seen a significant increase in my throughput since installing it. Belkin did a great job with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Regis J. Bates

customer_reviews.title: It Works !!
customer_reviews.text: I had problems with other routers because of the weird configuration of my house and the need to reach the basement with the wireless signal, this router fills the bill, lots of strong signal all over the house and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Bob M

customer_reviews.title: Not for Verizon Fios
customer_reviews.text: This item will not work with Verizon FIOS. I should have checked my old router before ordering this one. There is no Coax connection for the Belkin router.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I think this is a great product. I purchased the model almost 2 years ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great product. I purchased the model almost 2 years ago and I kept it on most of the time. So far it's still working and has never failed. My recommend is...don't waste your money on some cheap model, you get what you pay. And this one, it worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big Brother
customer_reviews.text: Works well. The range isn't what I was hoping for. Only a tad better than my small little D-Link N band router. I should have believed what I had read about router ranges. That it doesn't make much difference. Big brother restricts power.
customer_reviews.author: G. G. Husted

customer_reviews.title: I am sure is a good router but i try too many times and didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I did have an issue with the router. Wasn't factory reset. I am sure is a good router but i try too many times and didn't work for me. But my 5 stars review is for the seller. They reply to me really fast and issue me a refund very fast. I really like their customer service
customer_reviews.author: Manuel De Jesus Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Product is great - customer/technical assistance is not .....
customer_reviews.text: The router is working better than I expected. However, if you encounter any problems (like setting-up difficulties), I wish you "good luck" in trying to get help from the customer service # given. I'm just glad that the few skills I have came in handy to overcome my set-backs. Otherwise, I would have returned this router if I listened to the advice of the "technician" - he asked me to "return the router because it is defective".
customer_reviews.author: VPB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I had a Belkin before so I knew it was a good product. I brought this one for an upgrade since my family has increased its media use the smaller Belkin couldn't handle the heavier load. This one has allowed us to use multiple media devices at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Mochachip2016

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience!
customer_reviews.text: Router is working intermittently. Connection problems 2-3 times a week.When an IT guy finally said I should return it is was out of 30 day period. Bad experience!
customer_reviews.author: Joneybaloney

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating...
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 6 weeks and then started dropping Wi-Fi connections. Refund refused because it was more than 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: LA Pitman

customer_reviews.title: There's better out there
customer_reviews.text: I know there's no such thing as a perfect wifi router, but I have constant troubles with this dropping signal. Also, after a couple months, the only SSID that is usable is the guest ID. I have no idea why.
customer_reviews.author: Stutz

customer_reviews.title: Not adequate for the job!
customer_reviews.text: I expected this router to transmit wireless signal from upstairs to my downstairs home theater system (under 50 feet). It was not up to the job. Returned it and bought a Powerline wired system that is sending a very strong signal to my entire house. Love the Powerline.
customer_reviews.author: Qmado

customer_reviews.title: I Have a Stream
customer_reviews.text: Simple, out of box, setup. Standard network up and running in minutes. Total customization and guest network setup completed within a half hour. Dual bandwidth allows connection to regular devices like my computer and HD video streaming to my television. Very easy to setup and use. Very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: harpua vs poster

customer_reviews.title: Sorry Did Not Work For Me
customer_reviews.text: It gave me internet coverage throughout whole house at about 20mbps which is good, but it would not work my Apple 4s printer, and Belkin advised not compatable, and my Sprint Airave got poor quality. Good or internet ONLY....Not Phone VOIP or Apple Products.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Christopher Lee

customer_reviews.title: works great I now have two of the same model in ...
customer_reviews.text: works great I now have two of the same model in my house and I can have wireless in the entire house now
customer_reviews.author: Erock94

customer_reviews.title: High End Product With Moderate Price
customer_reviews.text: The dual band feature is something that is a must for homes with multiple wireless devices. Very happy with the performance and the ease of set-up.
customer_reviews.author: H.J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Belkin Router
customer_reviews.text: How do you setup up a wireless network with great coverage AND network the use of a non-networkable USB printer AND a hard drive storage unit? With a Belkin N750 router. Awesome piece of equipment! This little router is one of the best and easiest to use. I have always been a fan of Linksys but I think Belkin took a step past them with this little number. We have used it at work to do all of the above mentioned and have had absolutely NO problems out of it. I HIGHLY recommend this router!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S.

customer_reviews.title: So so router. Nothing great
customer_reviews.text: Expected it to work better, but I don't find a difference between this router and the cheap router from the phone company. They all work about the same despite the technical claims.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Prochorenko

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: The router had a low grade because it didn't come in a box nor did it come with software. Not a big deal, the software can be found on the Belkin website and the router was in near perfect condition. Set up is a breeze just install the software and setup will bring you to the login web page. I must say the range and connection are the biggest points for me on the product. In the living room which is about 16 feet from the router I get a constant 420+ Mbps and in the farthest room from the house 150mbps. Very happy with this purchase and look forward to using Belkin in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Buy with Confidence
customer_reviews.text: Prior to purchasing this N750, I was having to reset my router 5 or 6 times a day depending on how many users were in our house. I have had the N750 in use now for a month and have not had to reset it since I plugged it in. I have at least 10 devises using it all the time. I love the security. Easy to set-up though their website.
customer_reviews.author: Brian christy

customer_reviews.title: Decent speed, but kind of a pain to configure ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent speed, but kind of a pain to configure. The configuration page is very slow. Also has a limited number of MAC addresses allowed for access filtering.
customer_reviews.author: Otzen42

customer_reviews.title: ... Belkin model N300 and thought my internet was just super slow until I got this N750 model
customer_reviews.text: I had a Belkin model N300 and thought my internet was just super slow until I got this N750 model. Now I'm wondering if a higher number would've made it even faster. Had it 2 months now and very pleased with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Yes.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, by big pre-war apartment is fully wi-fi functional. Easy set up. Thus far, no signal dropping and excellent reception in areas that my old router could not service.
customer_reviews.author: Collage Artist

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wireless Router
customer_reviews.text: I had been having intermittent drops on my wireless connection every day in my home. I purchased the Belkin N750 Wireless DualBand N+ Router and have been very happy with the choice. I haven't dropped a single connection since I installed it three days ago. This is a very nice looking product as well as functional! Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Good strength and speed.
customer_reviews.text: Very strong signal strength and great speed. I have good reception at ~ 40 feet, through one interior wall and one exterior wall. My one complaint is that the router makes a sizzling noise when transferring data, it's a mix between a sizzling noise and the sound of writing to a harddrive. It's not loud, but it is consistently there. Otherwise it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I bought this router because I thought the range would be excellent. My family lives next door and we share an internet connection. Well...my 4 year old Linksys Wireless G router gives me the same range so I'm not that impressed
customer_reviews.author: CdotTaylor

customer_reviews.title: works all the time!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for 2 years now and it works well, I have never had a problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: sacx

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: this is much better than the other belkin we had that kept turning off and was a pain to use unless you sat at your computer all the time. was so nice a friend ordered him one also thanks
customer_reviews.author: Max2Maggie

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using it for a couple of days, but so far it is performing better and more consistently than my old router. I paid a lot more for this router than my previous Belkin router, so I am expecting good things.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Belkin N750 wireless router
customer_reviews.text: Belkin N750 N+ wireless router provides fast wireless connections even with three laptops doing simultaneous online activities to include music streaming, video chat, and YouTube; and wired connection to another router for VoIP phone. The wireless router is placed in a corner on the first floor and provides coverage to the basement, garage, and 2nd floor bedrooms. Basically, this router covers the whole house. With a USB connection, the router also functions as my printer server. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: G. Yee

customer_reviews.title: Nice wireless N router
customer_reviews.text: Works well with firmware version 1.10.17 (2014/3/13 1:52:6). It cannot assign static IP addresses.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: This router is a good buy! it has all of the features of ...
customer_reviews.text: This router is a good buy! it has all of the features of the Linksys e4200 it replaced and I haven't had one issue with it..... the range is better then the Linksys and the auto-heal function is nice to have overall I would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: unable to use
customer_reviews.text: This wireless system did not work with my internet provider (we live in the country and do not have a well known service provider). While the product itself may be ok, we never were able to test the system to see whether it would work or the quality of it. So that is why I gave it a 1-star.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Arner

customer_reviews.title: It gets better
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a 150 N router to this beast I live in a Medium to small sized house and now I get a signal from the driveway to way out in the backyard definitely a good buy at the price no need to spend extra cash on the newer AC router unless you have a massive amount of real-estate to cover this little guy should work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin JL Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up right out of the box.I was able to connect immediately after powering up and started streaming Netflix after a few minutes. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ole' Vista

customer_reviews.title: Switched to this when having trouble streaming to my chromecast ...
customer_reviews.text: Switched to this when having trouble streaming to my chromecast. Didn't think my old router was the problem, but apparently it was.
customer_reviews.author: tamarack

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it work good with my desk top and laptop too. I love the ideal of it having two usb in it. one for my printer and the other one for a hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: Belkin N750 dual band n+ router
customer_reviews.text: Nice wireless router. Every home should have one. The only down side is that it cannot mount onto a wall. So far it work great. Have not had any complains from my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Augustin A. Julien

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item was just as expected at a great price. Received in excellent condition, and just as promised.
customer_reviews.author: jaysoto0953

customer_reviews.title: excellent router
customer_reviews.text: I bought it about a month ago. It is excellent. Easy to install and streaming of the online video and netflex is great with wireless and wired connections. I will recommend it for any one use streaming. The price was very competitive
customer_reviews.author: M T Shata

customer_reviews.title: Range is super
customer_reviews.text: The range of my wifi signal has significantly changed with the belkin n750. I can surf the internet faster on my cell phones, playstation , wii, laptops (3), tablets (3), and the xbox 360 all at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Cash

customer_reviews.title: Belkin N750 Router
customer_reviews.text: Received the router on time plugged it in but I had to contact Belkin service to get it working and now it works great. would recommend it to anyone who needs a router.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to connect
customer_reviews.text: No issues at all. I upgraded from a previous Belkin. This one is great. We have 4 smartphones, laptop and a Roku. All, at times, run at the same time with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Shanira

customer_reviews.title: Good price value relationship
customer_reviews.text: The router is fine in general, has 2 USB port that is a great differentiator, but also has performance failures and a cheap finish. Although I must admit for $80 this the best router that you can find in the market
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Best EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is the best router in the market i really recommend it for every one its very fast and smooth and very very very good coverage! its better than all linksys routers ;> enjoy
customer_reviews.author: jawad

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: My experience with routers in the last couple years has been frustrating. I have the router in the basement transmitting to 3 floors(basement, 1st, and 2nd). With numerous electronics and plenty of interference from other appliances this is a difficult task for any router. However, this router did all that and either 4 or 5 bars consistently on Xbox360, PS3, IPAD, two Laptops and sometimes more when visitors are over. This thing rocks. Dont know about customer service as I have yet to require any.
customer_reviews.author: Theo Aranki

customer_reviews.title: Port Forwarding not working, Belkin N750 DB F9K1103-V1 -Resolved
customer_reviews.text: Port forwarding and UPNP not working, inconsistent router's settings user interface with tutorial, technical support not able to resolve - DHCP Client list does not report all clients connected. Now on level-2 support, hope they can resolve. Don't buy it if you need Port Forwarding; otherwise working fine. *** UPDATE *** on December 2nd, 2011 After 4 level of great customer support (they called me to Chile few times), I use DDNS option to have port forwarding working with Dyndns.
customer_reviews.author: Chamiza

product_meta.title: Belkin N750 DB Wi-Fi Dual-Band N+ Gigabit Router (F9K1103)
product_meta.description:
Belkin's N750 DB Wireless Dual-Band Belkin N+ Router provides up to 900Mbps throughput Wi-Fi + routing speeds combined.† The Belkin N750 DB gives you superior performance for home-theater video streaming and gaming. Featuring exclusive MultiBeam technology and dual-band speeds of up to 300Mbps + 450Mbps, the Belkin N750 DB gives you maximum throughput and multi-device coverage throughout your home. This router also features Gigabit ports for ultra-fast file sharing and 2 USB ports for wireless printing and media-sharing. The N750 DB also includes a suite of integrated Belkin applications for wirelessly playing videos from your library on your TV, backing up files, and automatically detecting and resolving potential network problems to keep your connection hassle-free. †Results based on independent third-party testing. Visit belkin.com/router-speed for details. The standard transmission rates - 300Mbps (for 2.4GHz), 450Mbps (for 5GHz), 54Mbps, and 11Mbps - are the physical data rates. Actual data throughput will be lower and may depend on the mix of wireless products used. A 10/100/1000 port is a gigabit port, therefore the port speed of the product is 1 gigabit.


AMAZON.COM




FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Enjoy a high-speed Internet connection for multi-video streaming and multi-player online gaming with the Belkin N750 DB Wi-Fi Dual-Band N+ Gigabit Router. This router allows you to stream HD video, enjoy multiplayer online gaming, download music, and print wirelessly from multiple devices throughout your home. It also delivers reliable performance when streaming media from Netflix, HuluPlus, and Vudu. Media Server by myTwonky simplifies photo and video streaming to multiple mobile devices, while the router's Dual Band technology lets you enjoy different activities without slowing down your connection. You can also filter unsafe or inappropriate Internet content with Parental Control powered by Norton. 

N750 DB WI-FI DUAL BAND N+ GIGABIT ROUTER
AT A GLANCE:
 * Up to 900 Mbps Wi-Fi + routing speeds combined1
 * Stream HD video, enjoy multiplayer online gaming, and download music anywhere in your home
 * Access the Internet on multiple computers, tablets, or smartphones
 * Simplify photo and video streaming with Media Server by myTwonky
 * Block unwanted content with Parental Control powered by Norton
 * Experience maximum throughput and multi-device coverage thanks to dual-band and MultiBeam technologies
 * Backed by a two-year limited warranty

Click here for more information.

Ideal For:

Ideal for HD video streaming from Netflix, HuluPlus, and Vudu*. View larger.

Enjoy multi-player online gaming with exceptionally fast connection speeds. View larger.

MultiBeam coverage allows you to connect to the Internet from anywhere in your home. View larger.

UP TO 900 MBPS THROUGHPUT WI-FI + ROUTING SPEEDS COMBINED1
Belkin's N750 DB Wi-Fi Dual-Band N+ Router provides:

 * Up to 900 Mbps combined throughput from WAN-to-LAN, LAN-to-WLAN, and WLAN-to-LAN
 * Two times faster Wi-Fi and WAN than competing routers
 * Up to 42 percent faster 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz Wi-Fi performance than competing routers
 * Up to 93 percent faster WAN downloads than competing routers
 * Consistent performance across all network connections

SUPERIOR VIDEO-STREAMING PERFORMANCE
You will enjoy ultra-fast video streaming, media sharing, and gaming thanks to this router's Dual Band technology. By running two bands simultaneously, the router and automatically prioritizes video and gaming for uninterrupted high-speed HD streaming. This means you will be able to enjoy video-streaming services--including Netflix, HuluPlus, and Vudu--with a reliable high-speed connection.* 

The N750 DB also features Media Server by myTwonky to make it easier to enjoy all your favorite media files. Simply plug in a USB drive and stream movies, music, and photos to multiple devices like your iPhone, iPad, or Smart TV.

POWERFUL SIGNAL STRENGTH FOR MAXIMUM COVERAGE AND RELIABILITY
Using exclusive MultiBeam antenna technology, the N750 DB lets you connect to the Internet on multiple computers or mobile devices from virtually anywhere in your home. 

For example, you can stream HD video downstairs while your roommates or family members play online games upstairs. 

FOUR GIGABIT PORTS FOR ULTRA-FAST FILE SHARING
The Belkin N750 DB features four gigabit ports for connecting multiple computers or wired devices. It also features two USB ports, so you can connect an external hard drive or printer for easy sharing of photos and files and wireless printing from any computer on your network. 

PARENTAL CONTROL POWERED BY NORTON
Protect your entire network with Parental Control powered by Norton. Block unwanted content to all your devices automatically with this customizable and easy-to-use software.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS AND WARRANTY INFORMATION
To set up your network with the N750 DB, you need a computer with a Microsoft Windows XP 32 (SP3 or greater), Windows Vista (32/64), Windows 7 (32/64), or Mac OS X (v10.5 or above); an installed network interface card and TCP/IP networking protocol; Internet Explorer (v7 or above), Firefox, Google Chrome, or Safari; a 1.8 GHz or faster processor; and a minimum of 512 MB of RAM. 

The N750 DB Wi-Fi Dual-Band N+ Gigabit Router is supported by Belkin's two-year limited warranty. 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
N750 DB Wi-Fi Dual-Band N+ Gigabit Router, power supply, setup CD, user manual, and networking cable. 

*Requires a Netflix-ready device and a Netflix Unlimited subscription (not included). 

HuluPlus subscription required (not included).

Vudu requires a media-streaming device (not included).

1900 Mbps is derived from the total WLAN 2.4Ghz, 5Ghz, and WAN. Test measured average throughput within a home network when connected devices are placed at 15 feet from router. The stated transmission rate is the physical data rate. Actual data throughput will be lower. Actual speed and distance will vary depending on interference, network traffic, building materials, and other environmental factors. Visit Belkin.com/router-speed or click here for more information.

Connect computers, Blu-ray players, and gaming consoles with ultra-fast transfer speeds† The standard transmission rates - 150Mbps (for 2.4 GHz), 300Mbps (for 5Ghz), and 11Mbps - are the physical data rates. Actual data throughput will be lower and may depend on the mix of wireless products used.

ONLY ACCEPT AUTHENTIC BELKIN PRODUCTS!
Beware of fakes! When you receive your Belkin Router, verify that you received all items listed in "What's in the Box" and make sure packaging is intact (see photo or setup video)!

 * Box is tightly shrink-wrapped.
   
   
 * Router is neatly nested enclosed within a plastic bag.
   
   
 * SSID, password and security type are taped to router. 
   
   
 * Setup CD is under the router. 
   
   
 * Power cord and the USB cable are nested under a cardboard flap. They have white tags hanging off of the cord/cable with an illustration of how each plugs in.
   
   

Please report to Amazon immediately if you have received a product in a different or damaged package. Enjoy your Belkin router!

Wireless speeds of up to 300 Mbps (2.4GHz) + 450 Mbps (5GHz)
Simulataneous dual-band operating on 2.4 and 5 GHz bands
Play videos from your library on to your TV —wirelessly
Self-Healing will detect and resolve network problems
